title: Citibank NA Open Ark
provenance: From the collection of Dan Friedman
medium: Offset lithograph on white wove paper
description:
Composite images, printed front and back of sheet incorporating graphic designs for Citibank posters, brochures and newsletters, all over- printed on design of multiple airmail envelopes with return to sender stamp (see 1997-19-430 and -431). Recto: Imprinted in black at left center: CITIBANK, and  logo and at lower quadrant of sheet, the Logo and a large black square. 
Verso: In addition to the black and white airmail envelopes, sepia colored photographic reproductions of turn of the 19th century musical performers.
name: Poster
